Package com.cmput301w21t36.phenocount

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Binomial
    This class represents objects used in binomial trials
    Count
    This class represents objects used in Count trials
    DatabaseManager
    Role: controller Goal: grant permission of using the database for other manager classes
    DiscussionManager
    Role: controller Goal: This class is used to manage the question list in the DiscussionActivity, and reply list in the QuestionActivity How to use: create an DatabaseManager object, which grants the access of collections Question and Reply in the database.
    Experiment
    This class represents the Experiment objects
    ExpManager
    This Class acts as an controller class for Experiments
    Measurement
    This class represents objects used in Measurement trials
    NonNegativeCount
    This class represents objects used in NonNegativeCount trials
    PlotsManager
    This PlotsManager class provides as a helper for the PlotsActivity class and has functionality that helps with computing data points for the plots.
    Post
    Role: model This Post abstract class can be specialized as class Question, and class Reply; it contains basic information for a post in the discussion forum.
    Profile
    This class represents the Profile object which is had by a User
    Question
    Role: model This Question class extends an abstract class Post; it contains basic information of a question.
    Reply
    Role: model This Reply class extends an abstract class Post, it contains basic information of a reply
    SearchingManager
    Will recieve all experiments from ExpManager and will allow for a keyword to search through all relevant experiments and return the related experiments
    Statistic
    This model class deals with displaying statistics for the trials of an experiment
    Trial
    This class represents the abstract trial it is extended by the different types of trials : Binomial, Count , NonNegativeCount, Measurement
    User
    Class that represents a User object
